username.label: Username or email address
username.required: Username or email address is required

username.label: Username
username.alphaNum: Username can only contain letters and numbers
username.minLength: Username must have at least {minLength} letters.
username.maxLength: Username is too long. It can contains maximium {maxLength} letters.

emailAddress.label: Email address
emailAddress.email: This is not a valid email address
emailAddress.maxLength: Email address is too long. It can contains maximium {maxLength} letters.

password.label: Password
password.minLength: Password is too short. It can contains at least {minLength} letters.
password.maxLength: Password is too long. It can contains maximium {maxLength} letters.

terms.accept: By clicking “Create account”, you agree to our {termsOfService} and {privacyPolicy}.

request.notFound: Request failed. Request endpoint not found on the server.
request.unknownServerError: There is an error on the server side. Please try again later.
request.failed: Request failed. Please try again later.
request.noResponse: Request failed. No response from the server.
